page.description: Bulk operation to recalculate all UX components.

section.title: How to Perform a Recalculate UX components Bulk Operation

step.description: To perform a *[ui:Recalculate UX components]* bulk operation, open the Web Projects Control Panel and select *[ui:Bulk Operations]* > *[ui:Recalculate UX components...]* from the *[ui:Edit]* menu:

Select the UX Components to Recalculate. Use the *[ui:Select All]*, *[ui:Un-Select All]*, and *[ui:Wildcard Select]* links at the bottom of the *[ui:Select UX Components to Recalculate]* dialog to choose the components to recalculate.
Click *[ui:OK]* to peform the bulk operation.

Alpha Anywhere may prompt you to adjust settings in a UX Component that is being recalculated, such as to enable pre-render optimizations or change the error reporting style. You may optionally change the setting described in the prompt when the dialog is shown. Click *[ui:OK]* to continue with the bulk operation.
step.note: You may see other prompts not shown here.

figure.title: Using an Error Style Not Recommended for Use in Container Width Layout Mode Prompt

step.description: A notice will be shown when the bulk operation completes. Click *[ui:OK]* to close the notice.
